thread.title: Young Dolph Reportedly Shot At 100 Times In Charlotte
thread.title_full: Young Dolph Reportedly Shot At 100 Times In Charlotte

author: Shaun M
title: Young Dolph Reportedly Shot At 100 Times In Charlotte
text:
Home > Music > Young Dolph Reportedly Shot At 100 Times In Charlotte Young Dolph Reportedly Shot At 100 Times In Charlotte 0 0 Posted by Shaun M , Feb 27, 2017 at 09:50am Young Dolph was in North Carolina for a show and got shot at 100 times. 
Up-and-coming rapper Young Dolph , who was in Charlotte for the Central Intercollegiate Athletic Association (CIAA) Tournament Weekend, was reportedly shot at close to 100 times, reports say. Sources say the Memphis emcee walked away without a scratch. 
Charlotte police said the shooting occurred around 6:30 p.m. on a road close to residential buildings at the intersection of 8th and North Caldwell Street, The Charlotte Observer reports. The incident happened just half an hour before the start of the men’s championship game of the CIAA at the nearby Spectrum Center. 
According to The Fader , Young Dolph was the target of the shooting even though Charlotte police refused to confirm it. In any case, Young Dolph shook off the incident quickly. He later performed with Migos and 21 Savage at unofficial CIAA-related party at Charlotte's Cameo Night Club. 
The bullets hit apartments and cars. Police said no one was injured and the shooting is currently being investigated. Here is a video of the aftermath of the shooting. The black SUV in the clip is reportedly Young Dolph's. < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 27, 2017 at 09:50am 0 Views 
The best Twitter reactions to the last night's unbelievable Best Picture snafu. Young Dolph was in North Carolina for a show and got shot at 100 times. 
Up-and-coming rapper Young Dolph , who was in Charlotte for the Central Intercollegiate Athletic Association (CIAA) Tournament Weekend, was reportedly shot at close to 100 times, reports say. Sources say the Memphis emcee walked away without a scratch. 
Charlotte police said the shooting occurred around 6:30 p.m. on a road close to residential buildings at the intersection of 8th and North Caldwell Street, The Charlotte Observer reports. The incident happened just half an hour before the start of the men’s championship game of the CIAA at the nearby Spectrum Center. 
According to The Fader , Young Dolph was the target of the shooting even though Charlotte police refused to confirm it. In any case, Young Dolph shook off the incident quickly. He later performed with Migos and 21 Savage at unofficial CIAA-related party at Charlotte's Cameo Night Club. 
The bullets hit apartments and cars. Police said no one was injured and the shooting is currently being investigated. Here is a video of the aftermath of the shooting. The black SUV in the clip is reportedly Young Dolph's.
